mapper.select: SELECT PI.PI_NICKNAME AS "NICKNAME" , TO_CHAR( PA.PA_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "RegDate" , TO_CHAR(PA.PA_CHECK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "CHECKDATE" , PA.PA_MEM_CODE AS "MEMCODE" , PA.PA_TJ_NO AS "TJNO" , PA.PA_NO AS "PANO" , TJ.TJ_JOB_CODE AS "JCode" , J.JOB_NAME AS "JName" FROM OPEN_PROJECT OP JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON OP.OP_CODE = TJ.TJ_OP_CODE JOIN JOB J ON TJ.TJ_JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON TJ.TJ_NO = PA.PA_TJ_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON PA.PA_MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE JOIN PERSONAL_INFO PI ON M.MEM_CODE = PI.PI_MEM_CODE WHERE OP.OP_CODE = #{code}

SELECT J.JOB_NAME AS "jName" , TJ.TJ_NO AS "tjno" , TJ.TJ_NUM AS "tjnum" FROM OPEN_PROJECT OP JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON OP.OP_CODE = TJ.TJ_OP_CODE JOIN JOB J ON TJ.TJ_JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE WHERE OP.OP_CODE = #{code} and TJ.TJ_NUM > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PART_APPLICANT(PA_NO, PA_DATE, PA_CHECK_DATE, PA_MEM_CODE, PA_TJ_NO, PA_AS_CODE) VALUES(PART_APPLICANT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{memCode}, #{tjno}, 'AS_3')
